sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Create a scheduled job to create original task for existing stories</description> <name>Populate original task and story columns</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var job = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script'); job.get('name', 'update_original_task_and_story_columns'); SncTriggerSynchronizer.executeNow(job);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-08-23 20:56:27</sys_created_on> <sys_id>14604a4d93f0030064f572edb67ffbb0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Populate original task and story columns</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">a519649247403110020ba9f8536d434c</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_14604a4d93f0030064f572edb67ffbb0</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-09-01 23:58:26</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Populate original task and story columns
